      • convert

        public static java.lang.String convert(java.lang.String dateStr,
                                       java.lang.String fromFormat,
                                       java.lang.String toFormat,
                                       com.ibm.icu.util.TimeZone fromTz,
                                       com.ibm.icu.util.TimeZone toTz)
        Converts passed date string from one format and timezone to other
        Parameters:
        dateStr - The date string to be converted
        fromFormat - The current format of date string
        toFormat - The format into which the date string should be converted to
        fromTz - The timezone in which the date string is formatted in
        toTz - The timezone in which the date string should be converted to
        Returns:
        The converted string
        Throws:
        SCException - if an error is encountered in parsing format or date string
